text:
Champions League
OL: Aouar titillates Mbapp√©!
Brilliant against Benfica last night, the Lyon area is dueling statistics with the Paris striker in the Champions League.
06 Nov 2019, 21:16 by Rafael Da Silva



Last night, Olympique Lyonnais won 3-1 against Benfica for the fourth Champions League group match. A success that allows men Rudi Garcia to climb to second place in their group behind Leipzig with 7 points on the clock. Author of a decisive pass to Memphis Depay for the 2-0, Houssem Aouar entertained the public Lyon throughout the game.




Mbapp√© slightly ahead of Lyonnais




Houssem Aouar decisive against Benfica last night + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

And this new decisive pass proves that the attacking midfielder shines on the European scene with his training club. Indeed, as indicated by Opta, Houssem Aouar has delivered five assists since the start of last season in the Champions League. Only Kyllian Mbapp√© does better for French players with 6 assists. Crack (s).
